<seg xml:id="C08_app711-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0021__main__23"/>next morning early I departed. Tears <lb n="c56-0021__main__24"/>gushed from the eyes of <seg xml:id="C08_app711-fMS_end"/>

<seg xml:id="C08_app716-fMS_start"/> mothers <seg xml:id="C08_app716-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C08_app717-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0021__main__30"/>blessing would have accompanied <seg xml:id="C08_app717-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C08_app718-fMS_start"/> me <seg xml:id="C08_app718-fMS_end"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0022__main__1"/>I threw myself into the chaise <lb n="c56-0022__main__2"/>that was to convey me <seg xml:id="C08_app720-fMS_start"/> away <seg xml:id="C08_app720-fMS_end"/> and <w ana="start"/>in<lb n="c56-0022__main__3"/>dulged<w ana="end"/> in the most melancholy <w ana="start"/>reflec<lb n="c56-0022__main__4"/>tions<w ana="end"/>. <seg xml:id="C08_app722-fMS_start"/> I <seg xml:id="C08_app722-fMS_end"/> who had ever been surrounded <lb n="c56-0022__main__5"/>by amiable companions, continually <lb n="c56-0022__main__6"/>engaged in <seg xml:id="C08_app724-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0022__main__d5e4276">ed</del> endeavouring to <seg xml:id="C08_app724-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C08_app725-fMS_start"/> give <seg xml:id="C08_app725-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c56-0022__main__7"/>mutual <seg xml:id="C08_app727-fMS_start"/> pleasure; <seg xml:id="C08_app727-fMS_end"/> I was now alone. <seg xml:id="C08_app729-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0022__main__8"/>In the university <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0022__main__d5e4283">wi</del> <seg xml:id="C08_app729-fMS_end"/> whither I was <seg xml:id="C08_app731-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0022__main__9"/>going <seg xml:id="C08_app731-fMS_end"/> I must form my own <seg xml:id="C08_app733-fMS_start"/> friends <seg xml:id="C08_app733-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c56-0022__main__10"/>and be my own <seg xml:id="C08_app735-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0022__main__d5e4291"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0022__main__d5e4293">introduction</del> <mdel>.</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0022__main__d5e4298"/>protector. <seg xml:id="C08_app735-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0022__main__d5e4298"/><mod eID="c56-0022__main__d5e4291"/>My <lb n="c56-0022__main__11"/>life had hitherto been remarkably <seg xml:id="C08_app737-fMS_start"/> retired <seg xml:id="C08_app737-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c56-0022__main__12"/>and <seg xml:id="C08_app739-fMS_start"/> domestic <seg xml:id="C08_app739-fMS_end"/> and this had given me <seg xml:id="C08_app741-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0022__main__13"/>an invincible repugnance to new <seg xml:id="C08_app741-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C08_app742-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0022__main__d5e4308">faces</del> <lb n="c56-0022__main__14"/>countenances. I loved my <seg xml:id="C08_app742-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C08_app743-fMS_start"/> brothers <w ana="start"/>Eliza<lb n="c56-0022__main__15"/>beth<w ana="end"/> <seg xml:id="C08_app743-fMS_end"/> and <seg xml:id="C08_app745-fMS_start"/> Clerval <seg xml:id="C08_app745-fMS_end"/> these were "old <lb n="c56-0022__main__16"/>familiar <seg xml:id="C08_app747-fMS_start"/> faces" <seg xml:id="C08_app747-fMS_end"/> but I believed <w ana="start"/>my<lb n="c56-0022__main__17"/>self<w ana="end"/> totally unfitted for the <w ana="start"/>compa<lb n="c56-0022__main__18"/>ny<w ana="end"/> of strangers.
